meanings.definition: The quality or state of being punctual.
meanings.sent3: His punctualities were so good, he arrived before the sun!
meanings.sent4: The punctualities of the clock were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The school's punctualities policy kept everyone on time.

meanings.definition: The practice of being on time.
meanings.sent1: The punctualities of the students made the teacher happy.
meanings.sent2: We should all strive for punctualities in our daily lives.
meanings.sent3: The cat's punctualities for dinner were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His punctualities were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The train's punctualities were a relief for the commuters.
